compiler

Class CodeGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • compiler.CodeGenerator

  •  class CodeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A code generator context. Includes the dag to convert, storage of emitted code, and helper functions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Node dag
      DAG to generate code for.
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lines
      Buffer for lines of code.
      (package private) java.util.HashSet<Node> visited
      Nodes that have already been visited during code generation.

    • Constructor Summary

      CodeGenerator(Node dag)
      Construct a new code generation context.

    • Method Detail

      • addCodeFor

        java.lang.String addCodeFor(Node node,
                          java.lang.String expr)
        Helper to add code for one node. The value of the node is computed by the expression in the given string. The emitted code either places the expression's value in a temporary variable and returns that variable for future reference as a common subexpression or it returns the expression outright.
        Parameters:
        node - node to add code to the context for
        expr - expression that will compute the node's value
        Returns:
        expression representing this node (either expr or a temp var)

      • emitCode

        void emitCode()
        Emit code for the DAG in this context.
